channel.title: Posts on Kane
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kane

item.title: Everything About Git
item.description: The Perfect Commit Add the rightchanges Include changes for only one topic, git add -p index.html Compose a goodcommit message, git commit Subject = concise summary of what happened Body = more detailed explanation What is now different then before? What’s the reason for the change? Is there anything to watch out for / anything particularly remarkable?

item.title: How to Create New Article
item.description: Run command hugo new posts/<name>.md git push

item.title: Try
item.description: Overview in Bazel Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories, and large numbers of users. LOC Statistics and Measuring At first, we used command git ls-files | grep -E '.java' | xargs wc -l to calculate the LOC of the cloned local repository.
